author: Sarah Johnson
content: Started the user interviews today. So far, the feedback about the current checkout process has been very insightful. Users are consistently mentioning that the number of steps feels too long.

author: Mike Chen
content: Great work on the research! The insights about the checkout process align with our analytics data showing high drop-off rates at step 3. This will definitely inform our wireframe decisions.

author: Mike Chen
content: I've completed the wireframes for the homepage and product listing pages. Working on the checkout flow wireframes now, incorporating the feedback from Sarah's user research.

author: Emma Wilson
content: The architecture planning is progressing well. I'm focusing on creating a modular structure that will make it easier to maintain and scale the app in the future. Should have the initial draft ready by end of week.

author: Jennifer Kim
content: Completed the API documentation review. Stripe and PayPal APIs are well-documented with clear rate limits. However, the shipping provider APIs have some inconsistencies that we'll need to handle carefully.

author: Kevin Zhang
content: Payment gateway integration is going smoothly. Stripe integration is complete and tested. Working on PayPal integration now. Should have both ready for testing by next week.

author: Alex Rivera
content: Kevin, make sure to implement proper error handling for failed transactions. We want to provide clear feedback to users when payments don't go through.

author: Sarah Johnson
content: The wireframes look great, Mike! The simplified checkout flow addresses all the pain points we identified in user research. This should significantly improve the conversion rate.
